OOC: I do read every post, don't pester me on that! I must have edited it o=
ut of my mail.

BIC: Squawktalk gets hit by the machine gun fire and overac=
ts from it, flapping his wings fast and furious...

  ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
  From: dcoburn 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, Feb=
ruary 26, 2001 4:33 PM
  Subject: CF/Triggerhappy


  OOC: Ok, this is rega=
rding Zone 5 and Orchestra and Darkfate and stuff.  Is someone attacking?  =
What is happening now?  I am a little confused
  OOC2: Ok, Soulstice, I pos=
ted Symphony firing machine gun rounds at Sqawktalk, but obviously you miss=
ed the post or just didn't bother reading.  And this may not be the situati=
on, but this is directed to everybody: READ EVERY SINGLE POST!  You do not =
have to read each one thoroughly, you can just scroll through it quickly.  =
I read every post now, ever since I missed some big events and learned my l=
esson, lol. 
   
  ::Symphony/Triggerhappy::
   
            Symphony looke=
d at Firearm.  Poor Firearm!  Symphony looked in the distance and heard a s=
hip or something.  He looked up at Menasor, and was a little afraid, but he=
 would do anything to show loyalty to his faction, so he fired 25 machine g=
un rounds at Menasor, aiming for the head which was high up, and the sun so=
rt of bothered his optics.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  =
           Triggerhappy laughed at Astro Train and his buddies.
   
       =
      "You really think you can destroy me?  Well guess what, I'm sorry to =
say, but that's the wrong answer!  Now, come back to the show some other ti=
me!  That is, if you live to see some other time!!!  DIE!" He said.
   
   =
             The cockpit windshield closed and secured Blowpipe.  Triggerha=
ppy fired 2 photon cannon blasts at Astro Train.
